_comment: Static demo data configuration for Viaplay demo. This data can be replaced with backend data or moved to reachu-config.json in the future.

assets._comment: Image asset names used as fallbacks throughout the demo

demoUsers._comment: Demo usernames for chat and social features

productMappings._comment: Product ID to URL mappings. In production, these should come from Product objects or backend

408895.name: Samsung 75" QN85F Neo QLED 4K MiniLED Smart TV (2025)

eventIds._comment: Event IDs used in timeline. Should be generated dynamically or come from backend

matchDefaults._comment: Default match values. Should come from Match model or backend

offerBanner._comment: Offer banner countdown values. Should be calculated from campaign expiration date
offerBanner.title: Ukens tilbud
offerBanner.subtitle: Se denne ukes beste tilbud

timelineEvents._comment: Static timeline event data. In production, this should come from backend or be generated dynamically
